sentences.english: And as it is in the floral tribe, so it is in God's kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 在植物界如此，在天國也是如此。

sentences.english: Plant lectins are widely distributed in plant kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 植物凝集素廣泛分佈於植物界。

sentences.english: In the vegetable kingdom Mr. Mivart only alludes to two cases.
sentences.chinese: 在植物界中，密伐脫先生僅提出兩點。

sentences.english: Herbalists dominated the sixteenth century botanical world.
sentences.chinese: 本草學家在十六世紀曾統治了整個植物界。

sentences.english: In the plant world glyphosate acts as a fake phosphate.
sentences.chinese: 在植物界中，草甘膦起到“僞磷酸鹽”作用。

sentences.english: The bitter fleabane in the wind is a typical drifting plant.
sentences.chinese: 那些風中輕飄的飛蓬，是植物界隨遇而安的典型。

sentences.english: Codon usage varies throughout the animal and plant kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 動物界和植物界密碼子使用頻率不同。

sentences.english: And most of our food comes from plants.
sentences.chinese: 而且大多數的食物均來自植物界。

sentences.english: Dyestuffs of since plant kingdom, it return to by nature and environmental protection on color that is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 得自植物界的染料，在美麗的顏色中迴歸自然和環保。

sentences.english: Vacuoles are ubiquitous in the plant kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 在植物界中液泡廣泛存在。

sentences.english: They are rare in the plant kingdom, and many plants are hermaphrodite.
sentences.chinese: 在植物界中比較少見，因爲許多植物體爲雌雄同體。

definition: angiosperm (flowering plants with seed contained in a fruit)
gymnosperm (plants with seed contained in a cone)
angiospermae (phylum of flowering plants with seed contained in a fruit)
Magnoliaceae, family of trees and shrubs
gymnosperm (plants with seed contained in a cone)
Ericaceae (botany), genus containing rhododendron and azalea
